title: Efficient energy policy discussions and events
text: OPEN works to create panel discussions, roundtable meetings, and conferences, to share their research and expertise with policymakers and other stakeholders.

title: Partnering with scientists on research and analysis
text: We work with scientists to conduct research and analysis on energy solutions and their impact.

title: Resources and support to communicate science research
text: We support for scientists to communicate their research to policymakers, the media, and the public. .

title: Engaging with policy-makers
text: We support scientists to engage with policy-makers directly and provide them with information and resources that can be used to support their efforts in the policy-making process.

title: Advocacy campaigns
text: We encourage scientists to participate in advocacy campaigns, such as letter-writing campaigns and petitions, to raise awareness about energy solutions and to support specific policy proposals.

title: Network of scientists
text: We provide a platform for scientists to share their expertise and collaborate on research and advocacy efforts.
